message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd be very interested.  I'm offering it to you for $11,500.  It's a great deal considering its value and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  $9,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $10,500? It's still a good deal for you and allows me to make a fair profit.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,250. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
